page.title: 04BURTON SALMON FARMER 1
page.content:
MR MACLOY
Mr.Macloy has been a farmer all his life. He grew up on a farm, that is how he learned his job. He starts work at 8 o'clock in the morning and sometimes finishes very late at night. Mr.Macloy does not like clearing the pigs out, he enjoys riding about the farm in his Range Rover. He worries about people getting hurt and about pests eating his crops,magpies especially are a great source of worry to him. When I was at Mr Macloy's farm I liked the geese best.They were nice.
